meta.title: DropVox - Transcribe WhatsApp Audio Messages
meta.description: Free macOS menu bar app that converts voice messages to text using AI. Works offline, supports 15+ languages.

hero.title: Transcribe
hero.description: DropVox is a macOS menu bar app that converts voice messages to text using AI. Works offline, supports 15+ languages, and never uploads your audio anywhere.
hero.requirements: Requires macOS 10.15+ • ~500MB disk space • Apple Silicon & Intel supported

preview.recentMessage1: "Hey, can you call me back when..."

features.title: Everything you need
features.description: Simple yet powerful features designed for one thing: converting voice to text without hassle.

localAI.title: Local AI Powered
localAI.description: Uses OpenAI Whisper running entirely on your Mac. No internet required after setup.

languages.title: 15+ Languages
languages.description: Supports Portuguese, English, Spanish, French, German, Chinese, Japanese, and more.

menuBar.title: Menu Bar App
menuBar.description: Lives quietly in your menu bar. Quick access without cluttering your dock.

clipboard.title: Clipboard Integration
clipboard.description: Copy audio files in Finder, paste directly in DropVox. Results auto-copied.

history.title: Transcription History
history.description: Access your last 10 transcriptions anytime. Never lose important voice messages.

privacy.title: 100% Private
privacy.description: Your audio never leaves your Mac. No cloud, no accounts, no data collection.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: Three simple steps to transcribe your audio files.

download.title: Download & Install
download.description: Download the DMG, drag DropVox to Applications. First run downloads the AI model (~150MB).

select.title: Select Audio Files
select.description: Click the menu bar icon, pick audio files. Supports .opus, .mp3, .m4a, and .wav formats.

getText.title: Get Your Text
getText.description: Transcription runs locally. Text is automatically copied to your clipboard when done.

privacy.title: Your privacy matters
privacy.description: DropVox runs entirely on your Mac. Your audio files are processed locally using OpenAI's Whisper model. No cloud uploads, no accounts required, no data collection. Ever.

cta.title: Ready to transcribe?
cta.description: Download DropVox and start converting voice messages to text in seconds.

support.title: Find this helpful?
support.description: DropVox is free and open source. If it saves you time transcribing voice messages, consider buying me a coffee.
